tool_description: Appetitoso is a semantic search engine for dishes. It allows developers to include a search engine and a recommender system into their applications by suggesting to the final users only the best dishes prepared by the restaurant near a location. Each dish has a score computed by Appetitoso taking into account more than 30 different parameter.
name: Food Search Engine
title: Food Search Engine

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Semantic Search Engine for dishes. It allows developers to find best dishes given a query and a position.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the place that you want explore.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the place that you want explore.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Text query in natural language. Typically it is the name of the dish (e.g. pasta) or the cuisine type (e.g. italian)

api_list.name: suggestions
api_list.description: This endpoint allows developers to get best dishes suggested by Appetitoso nearby.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the place that you want explore.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the place that you want explore.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Distance from the center (lat, lng) in KM. Max value = 15
